alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 2:56AM MST until December 05 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of trace to 1 inch below 2000 feet. Higher amounts of 3 to 6 inches over Whitebird Hill. * WHERE...Whitebird Hill and Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
